sentences.english: Has carved out a pen and a round of bitter and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 卻刻出了一支又一支揮繞不去的苦澀和甜蜜。

sentences.english: The bitter leaves turn red after frost.
sentences.chinese: 苦澀的葉，經霜後已經飄紅。

sentences.english: Not the body flavor arrive to fail bitter and astringent, again how know success of sweet?
sentences.chinese: 不體味到失敗的苦澀，又怎知成功的甘甜？

sentences.english: Stuck on you that thick but bitter taste.
sentences.chinese: 戀上了你那濃濃的卻又苦澀的味道。

sentences.english: But alone you must drink life's gall.
sentences.chinese: 然而人生苦澀只能獨飲。

sentences.english: And loved the sorrow of your changing face.
sentences.chinese: 和你漸衰的臉上流露的悲愁苦澀。

sentences.english: Tasted the bitter taste of dying ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 品嚐垂死的雄心那苦澀的滋味。

sentences.english: It masks bitter tastes and heightens flavor.
sentences.chinese: 它掩沒苦澀口味和升高味道。

sentences.english: Saline nose drops or sprays also ease congestion.
sentences.chinese: 苦澀的滴劑或噴劑亦可緩解充血。

sentences.english: Many developed illnesses relating to the bitterness and resentment they carried as a result.
sentences.chinese: 他們因壓抑而產生的苦澀與憤懣也發展成了疾病。

sentences.english: And he found himself trying to suppress a bitterness that was soul-destroying.
sentences.chinese: 他發現自己在竭力抑制損傷靈魂的苦澀。
葡萄酒中的苦澀味就是單寧。

sentences.english: Durer would slightly bitter stare and human beings.
sentences.chinese: 丟勒將略帶苦澀地凝視人自身。

sentences.english: Hero tear, are bitterer than the sea forever.
sentences.chinese: 英雄之淚，永遠比海水苦澀。

sentences.english: And he found himself trying to suppress a bitterness that was soul-destroying.
sentences.chinese: 他在竭力抑制損傷靈魂的苦澀。

sentences.english: Neither will I hide my bitter feelings nor will I exaggerate my grief and indignation .
sentences.chinese: 我不掩飾我內心的苦澀，也不虛張我的悲憤。

definition: to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
